title: Death Scanner: When Will U Die
creator: Creatiosoft

extendedInfo.description: When will you die? Anxious to know your Death Date and Time?? Then, try this free funny application, which calculates the Death Date and Time of the persons. Enter your name and Date of Birth and after some scientific computation, your Death date will be displayed. Death predictor or death scanner is a cool prank app, which tells about your unfortunate death time. So, test your destiny and know how long you can survive in your death race of life. Take the guesswork out of your fate, and take your future into your own hands. A perfect Death Calculator or death tester, which scans your fingerprint and calculates at what year, day and month you will die.How to use:1. Make sure your victim doesn't know about it.2. Go to your friend, tell them to follow instruction and let them scan their thumb (fingerprint) to the finger scanner.3. Wait for the fingerprint scanner results to appear and there you are... Make fun of your friend and have good laugh together!!If you want to fool your friends, family and co-workers or impress ladies at the party or club then this funny application is definitely for you!Features:- Prank your neighbors and make them think that your phone can detect their time of death!-  Simple, easy-to-use interface and Eye-candy HD futuristic graphics!- Enhanced animation- Cool sound effects Use Death Scanner to test your friends and colleagues death date and have lot of fun. Compare their date with yours and find out who will live longer!!  Note: This app is for entertainment purposesonly. It does not really scans your thumb or finger but definitely gives an illusion the person using this application will think that the phone actually scans the thumb/finger print..!!Give it a try!Tags: death, detector, die, fingerprint scanner,
